imos
Class Activation

java.lang.Object
  imos.Activation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IActivation, java.lang.Comparable<IActivation>
public class Activation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IActivation

An activation consists of the activated act and a weight that determines the strength of the activation. Primitive acts that receive the highest summarized activation weight are selected for enaction.

Author:
ogeorgeon
